ing: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
des: "Pronounced Basil Roo-ee, this wonderfully flavorful dish is the perfect summer appetizer. Basil and tomatoes are seasoned with jalapeno, garlic and sea salt.  I received this recipe from a wonderful woman in our toddler playgroup.  Serve with your favorite dippers such as baguette slices or pita chips."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the basil, tomatoes, bread crumbs, garlic, jalapeno, sea salt and olive oil. Cover, and refrigerate overnight. Serve with your favorite dippers!
